rooms.description: Spacious living area with minimalistic Brutalist aesthetic, concrete finishes and exposed structure.
Functional kitchen integrating Brutalist design with modern appliances and open-plan layout.
Dining space adjoining the living room, designed for family gatherings.
North-facing entrance with ample reception area, aligning with Vastu principles.
Service and utility room for maintenance and small repairs.
Car garage with integrated storage, following local building norms.

openings.description: North-facing entrance ensuring positive Vastu alignment and natural light.
Primary entry door in living area, complementing the design flow.

notes: This design incorporates Brutalist elements with functional spaces suitable for a family of four on a G+2 studio apartment house layout on a 60x90 feet plot. Additional floors and details would be expanded in the upper level design.
